EmailTemplate.name: 07-12-22 RET Freshop Post Webinar email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: In Case You Missed It: Progressive Grocer eCommerce Webinar Replay!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: How is your retail organization keeping up with the latest eCommerce trends? Here’s one way - watch the replay of our Progressive Grocer webinar. Nick Arlt, NCR Freshop Product lead, was joined by Andrea Casillas, VP of eCommerce at Sedano’s Supermarkets and Paul Doty, Director of IT at Sendik’s Food Markets where they discussed: - Ensuring your eCommerce program is scalable and future-flexible - Essentials of online merchandising and marketing through eCommerce platforms - Best practices for keeping your customers loyal to you Make sure you catch the replay to learn the shopper insights changing the grocery technology landscape forever. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
